summary: A comprehensive unit‑test suite that validates the behavior of various data‑analysis components, including basic analyzers, operation handlers, performance metrics on CPU/GPU, histogram generation, image and label statistics, filename case handling, segmentation summarization, and transformation logic.
business_intent: Provide automated verification to guarantee the correctness and reliability of data‑analysis pipelines used in computer‑vision and machine‑learning workflows, reducing defects and ensuring consistent metric reporting.
